name: Plady Joy
description:
A small side-scroller rpg.

Fight monsters, get money, upgrade yourself, become powerful and have fun!

A log of newly added/changed things:

01.09
  •  Added Redberries and Blueberries, collectable items.
  • Added Heal button on the NPC, which costs 10 Redberries and 10 Blueberries.
  • Reduced the power and the speed of the first enemy, "Purple square".
  • Removed the Load Game button.
  • Initial HP and MP is 50 each now.
  • Replaced "Moving Speed" skill with "Running Speed".
  • Dying will cause you a lose of 20 coins.
  • Removed the Inventory due to temporary working on it.
  • A status point will give you only 10 MP or HP, instead of 20 initial.
  • Changed player's moving speed and added acceleration and deceleration.
03.26
  • Added new currency: Tokens.
  • Added Crypt: Token powered
  • Added new feature: Your name is visible under the character now
  • Added feature: Name color. 3 free colors and 3 in the Crypt.
  • Double Jump and triple coin items are now belong to the Crypt.
  • The characters limit for the name is now 12, from 20 initial.
03.27
  • Added new Crypt item: Mouse Aim
  • Changed the price of the tokens: from 100 to 250 each (keep in mind that until the game will be fully out all the currency values will vary)
  • Changed the prices for Double Jump and Triple coins, Crypt items.
  • Added new name color purchasable via Crypt: White.
  • Added the 3 default name colors to the Crypt.
  • Changed the User Interface.
  • Temporary increased the coin drop and exp for purple square.
  • A slightly increase to the purple square power and health.
  • Dying will now cause you a lose of 40% of your coins, instead of only 20 coins initially.
  • Changed the font style for name, coins, hp, hp, and level.
  • Remodeled the area.
